name: DUNGEONS OF CHAOS
description: Retro turn-based 2D pixelart RPG. Exploration, character choices, riddles and challenges. 80+ hours of gameplay.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows XP SP2+ Memory: 1 GB RAM DirectX: Version 9.0 Storage: 200 MB available space
recommended_requirements: OS: Windows 7+ Memory: 2 GB RAM DirectX: Version 11 Storage: 300 MB available space
